physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Nervous system examination showed acupuncture-induced hypersensitivity in the right postauricular occipital nerve distribution area. Other findings were normal.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial examination findings were normal; however, the patient's condition rapidly deteriorated, leading to high fever, respiratory failure, and multiple organ failure.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pulmonary CT showed inflammation in the right lower lung. Subsequent chest X-ray re-examination indicated significantly worsening bilateral lung infection.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Chest X-ray re-examination showed that bilateral lung infection was significantly worse than the previous day's chest film.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Routine blood analysis showed neutrophils: 84.6%, ESR: 25 mm/h, sodium: 131.0 mmol/L. Other blood biochemical indicators were generally normal.
